detail_desc: Calf-length jeans in washed denim with elastication and a detachable belt at the waist. Side pockets at the front, a welt back pocket and straight, wide legs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a turtle neck, roll edges and long wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Decorative seam down the front and back.
Print-patterned wellingtons with a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Quilted, gently fitted, lightweight coat with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with a gathered frill around the neckline, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist, frill trim at the back and overlocked hems.
Short, straight-cut dress in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Shirt in a textured weave with a collar, buttons down the front and dropped shoulders. Short sleeves with cuffs and adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Nylon windbreaker with a stand-up collar, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, V-neck dress in an airy, crinkled weave with a flounce-trimmed neckline, short butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with an opening at the top and small frilled collar with ties at the front. Yoke at the back, a seam under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill trim. Unlined.

Shirt in patterned premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Dress in a soft rib knit with short sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top and concealed press-studs on one shoulder.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Elasticated scrunchies in soft faux fur.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with a pile-lined collar, dropped shoulders and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides. Pile lining. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Warm-lined ankle boots with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft and lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 3 cm.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Small, rectangular shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and a flap with a concealed, magnetic press-stud fastener. Imitation suede lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 10 cm. Width 22 cm.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Blouse in a plumeti viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in satin with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and belt with a metal buckle. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Chunky metal chain necklace with some links containing inset rhinestones. Adjustable length 31-41 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.

prod_name: Joe s/l pj in rib BB
detail_desc: Pyjamas with a T shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted, V-neck top in soft viscose with long sleeves.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, scalloped trim at the top and concealed buttoning.

Calf-length skirt in a viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave containing some linen. High paper bag waist with a small frill trim, covered elastication and detachable tie belt. Pleats front and back for added width, and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a viscose blend with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases and easy-access flap pockets.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in sturdy lace with long sleeves and an open back with a button at the back of the neck. Contrasting colour jersey lining and unlined sleeves.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Gathers at the shoulders and a seam with ties at the waist. Lined.
Kaftan in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie at the waist.
Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Sandals in scuba fabric with decorative straps. Straps with a hook and loop fastener at the top and around the heel. Scuba lining, rubber insoles and rubber soles.
High profile trainer boots in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Straight-cut jacket in a sequin-embroidered weave with shawl lapels and thin shoulder pads for more defined shoulders. No fasteners. Satin lining.
Short top in sequined velour with long sleeves. Jersey lining.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Unlined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Joggers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a twisted detail at the front.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Socks in a soft, fine knit with elasticated ribbing at the top.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hat in paper straw with embroidered details at the front and ears on top. Cotton lining. Width of brim approx. 3.5 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Faux fur gilet with a V-neck, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Metal hair clips with acetate on top. Length 6.5 cm.

Short dress in a cotton weave with a square neckline. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Lined triangle bikini top in scuba fabric with ties at the back of the neck and a narrow metal fastener at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket, decorative stitching on the legs and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and elasticated hems.
